answers.answer: I can't believe......... Addy will be the first one out!!!! I'm thinking about making next week my last week at work.  I'm soooo tired.  I want it over with already.  I wish you the best tomorrow, and keep us posted. :-)
I hear you, I'm sooo done, I feel guilty at times, but I know my health is also suffering with the pre-eclampsia so I don't feel too bad that she is a little early.
congrats kiki... will be anxious to hear how all goes and see pics of Addy... will be keeping you in my thoughts.
Congrats Kiesha!! That is soooooo exciting!! i cant wait to see pictures of her!
How exciting!  Get some rest, but if it were me, I'd be a nervous wreck waiting on 10:00 a.m. to roll around.  Good luck and I can't wait to your birth story and see pics...
so exciting good luck kiki and omg my blood pressue is much worse than that and i'm not on bed rest YET.. still working lol
I am so excited for you! I know you've been aching to hold that little girl, I hope everything goes wonderful tomorrow...I know how that severe preeclampsia is. lol
Kiki- i hope everything goes great tomorrow and i can't wait to see her!!

Thanks girlies!! I've got the car loaded up already! And I'm SOO glad it's Monday night b/c all of my fav. T.V shows are on so hopefully the eve. will pass quickly! The hard part is going to be tomorrow when I have to be at the hospital by 8am and I'm not scheduled to have her till 10! Plus my Dr. has another 8am surgery at the hospital across town! LOL So most likely he will be delayed, he assured me that the other will only take him a half hour not to worry! BUT I will be biting my fingers off!! I can't wait! :)
YAY!!!!! Good luck and God bless cant wait to see pics
OH, how exciting!! Can't wait to see the pics!!!!!
Good luck tomorrow Keisha, we will all be thinking of you and little Addy!!
all the best for today kiki... hope all goes really well and you both sail through it!!
Addy must be here by now!!! Can't wait to see her!!!
Somebody had a baby! lol cant wait to here from you
Does anybody know if she was taking a laptop to the hospital?  I know we shouldn't expect her to update on here anytime soon, but we're all so anxious!!!  Hopefully by tomorrow we'll get an update!!
can't wait for an update and pics.... the suspense is killing me haha

question: 10 am tomorrow! I'm on the books. Just got back from the OB. My b/p went crazy so it sealed the deal of any thoughts of him delaying. It was like 148/98 this morning. I also had protein in my urine so my status was changed to severe pre-eclampsia. So I'm on bed rest the rest of the eve, b/c I am also having contractions every 7-10 min. So this time tomorrw it will all be over with!
title: It's official!
